Aries: 6th House in Aries — Speedy workflow. You do it fast or not at all.
Taurus: 6th House in Taurus — Rituals with pleasure. Slow mornings and skincare routines.
Gemini: 6th House in Gemini — Multiple jobs. ADHD planner. Podcasts on loop.
Cancer: 6th House in Cancer — Emotional work. Nourishment = part of the routine.
Leo: 6th House in Leo — You need a glamorous routine. Health = sparkle.
Virgo: 6th House in Virgo — Queen of systems. Wellness tracker queen.
Libra: 6th House in Libra — Balanced diet. Yoga and cucumber water.
Scorpio: 6th House in Scorpio — Shadow work in your planner. Health = deep healing.
Sagittarius: 6th House in Sagittarius — Always running (away). Gym or flight? Both.
Capricorn: 6th House in Capricorn — Disciplined AF. You micromanage your to-do list.
Aquarius: 6th House in Aquarius — Unusual routines. Biohacking or future diet trends.
Pisces: 6th House in Pisces — You forget appointments but dream of wellness. Ocean meditations.
